# Scenarios Docs

- [F# for machine learning](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/scenarios/machine-learning.md): Learn about machine learning with F#.
- [F# for web development](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/fsharp/scenarios/web-development.md): Learn about web development options with F#.
